rect.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill: rgb(255, 255, 172); stroke-width: 5px; transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%;

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 40px; white-space: pre;

rect.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 5px; fill: rgb(215, 255, 172); transform-origin: 477.641px 231.715px;

text.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre;
